system.description: You instantly change the appearance of the subjects and maintain that appearance for the spell's duration. You can make them appear to be anything you wish; they look, feel, and smell like the creatures they resemble. Affected creatures resume normal appearances if slain. You must succeed on a Disguise check to duplicate a specific individual (+10 bonus). Unwilling targets can negate with Will save or spell resistance. Observers can attempt Will disbelief to see through the glamer.
system.target: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
